# vertexFormat

**Instance Property**

The format of each vertex position in the vertex buffer property.

## Declaration

```swift
var vertexFormat: MTLAttributeFormat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to a value that represents the pixel format of the data you assign to the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAccelerationStructureTriangleGeometryDescriptor/vertexBuffer] property. The property’s default is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLAttributeFormat/float3].

## Configuring vertex data

- **vertexBuffer**: A buffer that contains vertex data.
- **vertexBufferOffset**: The offset, in bytes, for the first vertex in the vertex buffer.
- **vertexStride**: The stride, in bytes, between vertices in the vertex buffer.
